verses.text: 我向你們推薦我們的姊妹非比；她是堅革里教會的執事。

words.note: Biblical term for an appointed servant in the church.

verses.text: 請你們在主裡用合乎聖徒身分的態度去接待她。無論她在甚麼事上有需要，請你們都幫助她；因為她曾經幫助許多人，也幫助了我。

words.note: Refers to God or Jesus Christ in Christian contexts.
Biblical term for believers, not just canonized saints.
Here, it indicates the manner of action of the following verb.

verses.text: 問候在基督耶穌裡與我同工的百基拉和亞居拉；
他們為了我的性命，置生死於度外，不但我感激他們，連外族的眾教會也感激他們。

words.note: An idiom meaning to not care about one's own life or death.
Biblical term for non-Jewish people.

verses.text: 也問候他們家裡的教會。問候我親愛的以拜尼妥，他是亞西亞省初結的果子。

words.note: Biblical idiom for the first converts of a region.

verses.text: 問候馬利亞，她為你們多多勞苦。

words.note: Repetition emphasizes degree.
Implies hardship or strenuous effort, often for others.

verses.text: 問候曾經與我一同被囚的親族安多尼古和猶尼亞；他們在使徒中是有名望的，也比我先在基督裡。

words.note: More literary or formal than modern '坐牢'.
Refers to blood relatives or those from the same nation.
Often used after '在' to mean 'amongst' or 'in the midst of'.
Refers to a high standing or esteem.
Often combined with '在' to mean 'in' or 'within'.

verses.text: 問候在主裡我親愛的暗伯利。

words.note: Referring to Jesus Christ.
Often combined with '在' to mean 'in' or 'within'.

verses.text: 問候在基督裡與我們同工的珥巴努和我親愛的士達古。

words.note: Often combined with '在' to mean 'in' or 'within'.
Specifically refers to those who work together in ministry.

verses.text: 問候在基督裡蒙稱許的亞比利。問候亞里斯多博家裡的人。

words.note: Often combined with '在' to mean 'in' or 'within'.
Often used passively, meaning 'to be granted' or 'to receive (favor)'.
Implies receiving praise or endorsement.

verses.text: 問候我的親族希羅天。問候拿其舒家中在主裡的人。

words.note: Often used as a suffix indicating 'in' or 'among'

verses.text: 問候在主裡勞苦的土非拿和土富撒。問候親愛的彼息；她在主裡多多勞苦。

words.note: Reduplication emphasizes degree

verses.text: 問候在主裡蒙揀選的魯孚和他的母親；她也是我在主裡的母親。

words.note: Often indicates passive voice, 'to be given' or 'to suffer'

verses.text: 問候亞遜其都、弗勒干、赫米、百羅巴、赫馬，以及和他們在一起的弟兄們。

words.note: Used in the Bible to refer to fellow believers.

verses.text: 問候非羅羅哥和猶利亞，尼利亞與他的姊妹和阿林巴，以及同他們在一起的眾聖徒。

words.note: Can refer to a group of sisters or female siblings in general
Indicates a multitude or group, often preceding a noun
Lit. 'holy disciples'

verses.text: 你們要用聖潔的親吻彼此問安。基督的眾教會都問候你們。
弟兄們，我勸你們要提防那些離間你們、絆倒你們、使你們違反你們所學的教義的人。你們也要避開他們，
因為這樣的人不服事我們的主基督，只服事自己的肚腹，用花言巧語欺騙老實人的心。

words.note: Often refers to carnal appetites/desires in biblical context.
An idiom meaning 'flowery and clever talk'.

verses.text: 你們的順服已經名聞各處，所以我為你們高興。我願你們在善事上有智慧，在惡事上毫不沾染。

words.definition: not at all, in no way

verses.text: 賜平安的 神快要把撒但踐踏在你們腳下。願我們主耶穌的恩惠與你們同在。

words.note: The character 神 can mean 'god' or 'spirit'. Here, it is God (the Divine Name).

verses.text: 我的同工提摩太和我的親族路求、耶遜和所西巴德都問候你們。
（我──代筆寫這封信的德圖──也在主裡問候你們。）
那接待我也接待全教會的該猶，問候你們。本城的司庫以拉都和夸圖弟兄問候你們。
（有些抄本有第24節：「願我們主耶穌基督的恩惠，與你們眾人同在。阿們。」）

words.note: Commonly used as a measure word or for sections/verses.
Refers to Jesus Christ in this context.
A transliteration of the Hebrew 'amen', meaning 'so be it'.

verses.text: 神能依照我所傳的福音和耶穌基督所傳的信息，照著他奧祕的啟示，堅定你們。

words.note: Lit. 'blessed news'

verses.text: 這奧祕自古以來祕而不宣，但現在藉著眾先知所寫的，照著永恆的 神的諭旨，已經向萬國顯明出來，使他們相信而順服。

words.note: A literary idiom meaning 'to keep something secret without revealing it'.
Often used in formal or biblical contexts to mean 'all of' or 'many'.
A grammatical particle often used to form nominalized clauses.
Often capitalized as 'God' in English Bibles when referring to the one God.
Formal term for an imperial or divine decree.
Indicates that something has become apparent or emerged.
Connects clauses, often indicating cause-effect or logical sequence in formal contexts.

verses.text: 願榮耀藉著耶穌基督，歸給獨一全智的 神，直到永遠。阿們。

words.note: Used to express a wish or a prayer.
Literally 'return to give' or 'be attributed to'.
Emphasizes singularity and exclusivity, especially for God.
A theological attribute, referring to God's complete wisdom.
Often capitalized as 'God' in English Bibles when referring to the one God.
